name: Minotaur Living Crystal Statue
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The statue makes two attacks: one with its greataxe and one gore attack.

action.name: Greataxe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Flying Shards
text: In response to a creature hitting the statue with a melee weapon attack, the statue deals 11 (2d10) piercing damage to the attacker.

description:
Given life through powerful magic, a large, crudely carved crystal minotaur guards the tunnels in Isle of the Abbey.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 245
